long_description: A small size of the classic wire aviator, the SunCloud Patrol polarized sunglasses provide full coverage and 100% UV protection to keep your eyes shielded from the sun. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Sturdy metal alloy frames feature spring hinges for a custom fit. Silicone nose pads become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Gold frames feature polarized brown lenses to eliminate glare and enhance contrast in bright conditions. Silver frames feature polarized gray lenses to eliminate glare in bright conditions without distorting colors. 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens-SunCloud features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). Designed to fit medium sized faces.
short_description: A small size of the classic wire aviator, the SunCloud Patrol polarized sunglasses provide full coverage and 100% UV protection to keep your eyes shielded from the sun.
